title: Please read need help!
body:
Ok i so i recantly got my first ever punishment on league of legands my main account has never recived a ban of any type in the 2 and a half years of playing i am not a toxic person but i can come across rough sometimes as this chat log shows but i have never had issiues with it 

the chat log in question is a team full of what you would call blamers they fail there own lane and blame someone els and accuse them of being toxic not once did i say or do anything to harm my team just explaining (well trying to) what they were doing is wrong 

now i ask you whoever  reads this compare some chat logs you have seen before to mine and tell me if this deserves a punishment at all ? because i dont think it i deserve a chat ban from only one game compared to poeple that are extremely toxic and get the same punishment 

Game 1 
Örnn Bot: woops 
Örnn Bot: bamboozled 
Örnn Bot: im the original Ornn bot of OCE 
Örnn Bot: gw 
Örnn Bot: cooldowns voi 
Örnn Bot: boi 
Örnn Bot: people say im fat 
Örnn Bot: im just hairy 
Örnn Bot: nah 
Örnn Bot: nah ornn is really beafy 
Örnn Bot: just short 
Örnn Bot: and hairly 
Örnn Bot: ziggs 
Örnn Bot: cmon man 
Örnn Bot: ty 
Örnn Bot: 4man bot > 
Örnn Bot: wtf 
Örnn Bot: well 
Örnn Bot: thats one thing to learn 
Örnn Bot: ziggs 
Örnn Bot: learn how to p[ut wards down 
Örnn Bot: learn how to put wards down 
Örnn Bot: another loss 
Örnn Bot: fed top lane fed mid lane afed bot lane 
Örnn Bot: dont call me trash because you're failing 
Örnn Bot: you dont ever blame somone els because of you own mistakes 
Örnn Bot: you both died once to 4 man gank 
Örnn Bot: the other 2 is because you did somthing wrong 
Örnn Bot: jax doesnt listen so he dies to nasus 
Örnn Bot: and ziggs is just bad at ziggs 
Örnn Bot: BLUE 
Örnn Bot: TY 
Örnn Bot: of course i am lol 
Örnn Bot: you guys dont go to blue biff when i ping 
Örnn Bot: dont expoect me to help you if you cant help somone els 
Örnn Bot: saying lol but its the truth 
Örnn Bot: i still got my blue buff 
Örnn Bot: see 
Örnn Bot: i only die because none of you can contole you lane 
Örnn Bot: ziggs didnt ping missing 
Örnn Bot: and all 3 of us died 
Örnn Bot: dont play then 
Örnn Bot: go pla bots 
Örnn Bot: no i just want to win games 
Örnn Bot: im the idiot for wanting to win games ? 
Örnn Bot: and telling you guys what you're doing wrong 
Örnn Bot: it does matter 
Örnn Bot: this is not urf 
Örnn Bot: play to win in all game modes 
Örnn Bot: you want to fuck around 
Örnn Bot: and say you dont care 
Örnn Bot: but you call people bad for not doing what you want 
Örnn Bot: its ironic 
Örnn Bot: im not calling any of YOU 
Örnn Bot: im not calling any of YIOU iconic but what you are saying is ironic 
Örnn Bot: i guess this is what you expect from low level/low elo 
Örnn Bot: yep mute me 
Örnn Bot: only doing me a favor 
Örnn Bot: lets break down what has happned today 
Örnn Bot: so my team has failed their lanes 
Örnn Bot: the they blame me 
Örnn Bot: i tell them what they have done as a mistake 
Örnn Bot: and then thet try and flame 
Örnn Bot: dont speak 
Örnn Bot: i didnt flame at all 
Örnn Bot: i said to you what you did wrong 
Örnn Bot: and you took it the wrong way 
Örnn Bot: called me a trash jg 
Örnn Bot: when all is aid is you're doing bad 
Örnn Bot: i didnt call you bad 
Örnn Bot: sigh

replies.body: nah they basicaly tell me to go away even if it is unfairly given

Yeah basically, but that is what you will get told, and that's technically the best advice.

The one person i have seen get unbanned was me telling a useful volunteer, them doing something about it by telling Gehirn, and the ban being overturned (about a week after the thread had been out because i was talking to the volunteer for other reasons, and mentioned it in passing.)

There is no real method for getting unbanned, because either the support team doesn't give a fuck, or doesn't have the power to do what we get told they can, and Riot don't read these threads enough to do it themselves.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=9eOFgpe6,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2018-01-07T09:31:44.245+0000)
>
> Yeah basically, but that is what you will get told, and that's technically the best advice.
> 
> The one person i have seen get unbanned was me telling a useful volunteer, them doing something about it by telling Gehirn, and the ban being overturned (about a week after the thread had been out because i was talking to the volunteer for other reasons, and mentioned it in passing.)
> 
> There is no real method for getting unbanned, because either the support team doesn't give a fuck, or doesn't have the power to do what we get told they can, and Riot don't read these threads enough to do it themselves.

Yup, can't agree more. My friend got told by support when he was permed "there's truly no mechanism for recovering an account". We know that's a load of bullshit thanks to you getting gehrin to unban luna. Well done by the way, she's spoke to me about it and she did deserve it. But back to the point they will just tell you "it was deserved" with a load of other bullshit about trying to get you to improve and how to properly use their mute button and tolerate... bullying.. I guess LOL

You did say ziggs was bad at ziggs, and similar case to mine except no swearing at all. A ridiculous reason to be punished and riot will ignore it and say that you're abusing the in-game chat in a non constructive way. They will tell you to mute and move chat off screen and to get over it lol.  

If this was a 5 game chat restriciton, you're now heading towards level 2 which is 20 game chat restriction. If it was 20 games, you're next penalty is a 2 week ban. You've been penalised for simply talking to your team mates and trying to communicate.  Good system imo.

His chat is actually benign assuming nothing has been edited and we aren't missing key details. Assuming that is the case he has an argument for his punishment to be revoked. Yours was not, and you do not.
i csn screen shot the chat logs if you want ? might be 2-3 pictures if you feel like im editing it

It was only as a clarification for the other guy, personally I don't feel that, but you never really know. I'm trying to see if I can track something down for you but it's slow going. I was going to wait until I had something more worthwhile to tell you before posting, but it kinda just left you high and dry sorry.

Simply put, those logs are very tame and probably shouldn't be punishment worthy unless there was a gameplay offence attached, but if there was it should't have been a chat ban. In the meantime I'd recommend submitting a ticket to player support since at the very least with a ticket open they can contact you directly. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

___

To address some other comments as well real quick, it's not volume of reports that gets you punished, it's quality (though volume will defs get you noticed for manual reviews). The bot catches context to a degree but there will always be hiccups with any system, and given the tone of your logs it probably thought there was more negativity there than there was.

It doesn't show the full log because it's your behaviour that's being reviewed, not everyone else's, and negativity is negativity regardless of who started it, but understandably if a relatively innocent player gets caught up it looks a little weird to just have your logs.

but with the quality thing that was one of the only games pre level 15 ive even talked in othe rgames i just want to end the game win or lose for some xp because the other players are new and the same account level so im not even sure why the system even picked me up for a punishment i have done nothing wrong and have not broken any of there terms of use. making a supoort ticket about the issie didnt help they have basicaly told me theat i got banned for a reason (they wont tell me why) its an automted system the punishment syustem is not perfect and far from it
I'll see if there's anything I can do about support but no promises.

And here we run into the same argument, the support team can't do anything, either by refusal or by lack of ability to do things, and we again come to your advice having to be message support being utterly useless.

So do we get an admission that Riot support is useless yet?

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=9eOFgpe6,comment-id=0001000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-07T09:28:26.225+0000)
> So do we get an admission that Riot support is useless yet?

I gave up emailing support. I shot one off every now and then for reporting some after game " KYS / I hope you get raped " and so on.
But for support in anything else. I never email riot.

To me it seems Riot has gone full automatic. [Here](https://support.office.com/en-us/article/send-automatic-out-of-office-replies-from-outlook-9742f476-5348-4f9f-997f-5e208513bd67) is one of the things I am talking about. 
Also [here](https://arstechnica.com/gaming/2015/05/riot-rolls-out-automated-instant-bans-for-league-of-legends-trolls/)

To me.. I have been playing this game since it became free to play. { Yes this game was paid to play once } and in that time..
Customer service has just gone out the window. I got ban once for calling a duo " Butt buddies " to Aussies it isn't homophobic. But to US it is.

I made a post about it and I got a real RED post in reply. OCE / NA / EU and so on.. Have been getting less of real reply and more of the typical " Hi I am bob from Riot. Sorry to hear that. We are working on it "
When it comes to OCE.. All we get is green post. Not Red.. Not anything at alll from Riot. Just MPV's
Yeah and it takes one of the volunteers getting off their ass and contacting Gehirn to actually get something done for a false flag when it comes to bans.

hey thansk i aprreciate it ive done all i can with support tickets as an ordinary player its juts the help i got was not very helpfull even know i meantioned that one of the Emissaries gave me advice and that my ban has a reason to be revoked i just want my honor level back because this is a really un unfair use of there punishment system and the fact that a player can get pmenently banned for my chat log is even worse

i was defending him and thats what the full chat logs prove but it only showes what i said the people i was trying to explain to were flaming ill try to find the game and link it 
https://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/196674758/202553382?tab=overview

Automated system, if you get enough reports you're gone. It's all luck, if you're unlucky everyone will remember to report and you're gone. It's best to stay safe and not rage at all, but of course that's easier said than done.

if you get enough reports for a reason you're gone i have done nothing wrong so i dont see why i got punished 

ive seen people with chat logs from 3 games with the same punishment as me and they're were much much more toxic 
this is one chat log from one game when i was under level 14
